examples: Any investment involves an element of risk.
The clotted cream added a creamy element to the homemade trifle.
My stepmother was in her element, organizing everything.
We should not give preferential treatment to one element to the detriment of the others.
The film incorporated abstract imagery and surreal elements to convey the protagonist's inner emotional journey.
words.defineEn: an essential or typical feature or part of something
words.defineVi: một tính năng thiết yếu hoặc điển hình hoặc một phần của một cái gì đó

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: Beat it!
Truly we have beaten swords into ploughshares!
Don't beat around the bush - get to the point!
They could easily have beaten us.
The team then beats a retreat from the mall, hoping no one noticed them.
words.defineEn: a piece of music or a poem's main rhythm
words.defineVi: một bản nhạc hoặc nhịp điệu chính của một bài thơ

examples: The musician's fingers lightly touched the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
I love playing the piano and composing my own melodies.
Rodgers’s melodies had a distinctly American sound.
- You changed the melody.
Every lyric and melody was right there.
words.defineEn: the arrangement or succession of single musical notes in a tune or piece of music
words.defineVi: sự sắp xếp hoặc nối tiếp các nốt nhạc đơn lẻ trong một giai điệu hoặc một đoạn nhạc

examples: His lyrics in this song focus on describing his ability to keep going with his music, no matter what gets in the way of him.
The concert started off great, but it ended on a sour note when the singer forgot the lyrics to the final song.
Learn more lyrics.
♪ Is that the lyric?
Saying the lyrics.
The tax increase sounded the death knell for the business.
He sounds about as much fun as a wet weekend in Carmarthenshire.
The bell sounded for dinner.
A cup of tea sounds perfect.
Your presentation sounded great, honestly.
words.defineVi: bất cứ điều gì mà chúng ta có thể nghe thấy

examples: That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
A voice came from the kitchen.
His voice dropped to a whisper.
Those coffin nails are going to hurt your voice.
Her voice broke as she relived the experience.
words.defineEn: the sounds that a person makes when speaking or singing
words.defineVi: những âm thanh mà một người làm khi nói hoặc hát

examples: The team's performance is standing on shaky ground after a series of losses.
Their performance was nothing to write home about.
The performance improved as their confidence grew.
The director praised the actor for their outstanding performance in the movie.
During their performance, they turned heads with their exceptional talent and stage presence.
words.defineEn: the act of presenting something such as a play, piece of music, etc. for entertainment
words.defineVi: hành động trình bày một cái gì đó chẳng hạn như một vở kịch, một bản nhạc, v.v. để giải trí
